object_config:
  model_name: test-model
  schema:
    type: object
    properties:
      answer:
        type: string
    required: ["answer"]

  type: object
  properties:
    userMessage:
      type: string
  required:
    - userMessage

  props:
    userMessage: "What is 2 + 2?"
---

</System>

</User>
